items.value: This tutorial will teach you the basics of the game!
See this candy with a trail? It's under your control, just touch the screen!
Collect at least 3 candies in a row
Burns all candies in a row, spawns randomly
Burns all candies in a column, spawns randomly
Burns all candies of the same color, burn 6 or more candies to spawn candy with this bonus
Get enough points to unlock new backgrounds
Touch the screen and move finger to desired position
Burn candy with this bonus to destroy whole row
burn candy with this bonus to destroy whole column
Burn candy with this bonus and it will destroy all candies of the same color
If you make a cascade of candy destruction this active bonus will appear
If you burn 6 or more candies this active bonus will appear
here you can spend your candies to buy upgrades and bonuses
you can upgrade all these buildings just for the sake of their sweet beauty
but some of them will give you powerful bonuses and passive income of candies
this is gift house, when upgraded it provides you with this bonus
this is biscuit house, when upgraded it provides you with this bonus
and the castle generates candies, better upgrade - higher income
and this is christmas tree, let's have a closer look
here you can test your luck and win upgrades, christmas tree decor or some candies
you can also earn some candies by watching ads!
that's it, you're ready to build your sweet lemonade city!
